ew-extension.name: YouTube Videos
ew-extension.author: e.World
ew-extension.description:
YouTube Videos Developer Website: https://developers.google.com/youtube/ Please refer to YouTube web site for the licensing terms: http://www.youtube.com/static?template=terms
Parameter description: - width: width of the video (px) (e.g. 426) default is 426 - height: height of the video (px) (e.g. 240) default is 240 - videoid: YouTube video id (e.g. "JW5meKfy3fY") - autoplay: autoplay video or not (boolean, true/false) - *_field: the field holding the parameter value above
Note: YouTube is not part of PHPMaker. Please read "Third-Party Tools" in the help file.
